# Segment.ValidateAndComputeLength method

Validates all properties of the segment such that the segment is ready for serialization, and computes the body length of the segment.

```csharp
public abstract int ValidateAndComputeLength()
```

## Return Value

The body length of the segment (total length of segment after the optional identifier, and excluding any out-of-band data).

## Remarks

This method is not called if the segment does not have length.
